name: JBL VRX932LA-1 Loudspeaker
description: The JBL VRX-932LA-1 (Black) is a lightweight, compact, passive and bi-ampable two-way line array speaker system, with an 800-watt continuous passive program power handling capacity, designed for use in arrays of up to six units.
features: 2-way passive or bi-ampable 800-watt line array P.A. speaker system for smaller venues with up to 6-unit array capacity
12 inch Neodymium magnet Differential Drive(TM) woofer for high-power capacity and light-weight
Three 1.5 inch Neodymium Annular Ring Diaphragm technology drivers for high power capacity, high-frequency extension and directivity
Constant Curvature waveguide technology for reliable array coherence
Array Configuration Selector switch - permits array in passive mode, allows for precise directivity and level attenuation
Tripod or subwoofer mounting of up to 2 speakers for multi-range floor placement

name: QSC K12 Active Loudspeaker
description: The QSC K12 offers the familiar voicing, elegant style, and rugged reliability that the K Series is known for, plus double the power, increased SPL, and greater bass extension. Improved DSP management exhibits unprecedented clarity.
features: 1000-watt,continuous Class D power modules in all models
Eyebolt and yoke mount accessories available

name: Shure SM58 Dynamic Microphone (With On/Off Switch)
description: The Shure SM58S Vocal Microphone features a unidirectional (cardioid) dynamic vocal design, well suited for professional vocal use in live performances, sound reinforcement, and studio recording.
features: Frequency response tailored for vocals, with brightened midrange and bass roll-off
Uniform cardioid pickup pattern isolates the main sound source and minimizes background noise
Pneumatic shockmount system cuts down handling noise
Effective, built-in spherical wind and pop filter
Supplied with break- resistant microphone clip that rotates 180 degrees

name: ULXP Wireless Receiver
description: The Shure ULXP4 professional wireless receiver offers an exceptional value in both performance and price, for both working musicians and sound installers.
features: Use of wireless handheld microphone or lapel microphone with each receiver.
Automatic Frequency Selection with group scan function
Advanced multi-function LCD displays group and channel

name: Pioneer DJM 900XS2 Mixer
description: Take your performance to new heights with the DJM-900NXS2, which features our first ever 64-bit mixing processor for a warmer, more nuanced sound. We’ve fine-tuned the EQ and fader curves and enhanced the FX controls to give you even more creative choice.
features: 6 studio-quality sound FX - Sweep, Filter, Crush, Dub Echo, Noise and Space
Use the large X-Pad to engage 14 different types of Beat FX and adjust the parameters with just one finger
Choose which frequency range you want to apply FX to. You can add echo to the vocals, for example, or double the rhythm of hi-hat with the touch of a button

Use built-in FX and an external FX unit at the same time. Simply connect external hardware via Aux or your iPhone/iPad via USB to engage instrument and FX apps - try it with the RMX-1000 for iPad, or DJM-REC
A built-in USB sound card allows simultaneous input/output of stereo signals from 4 ins and 5 outs

name: Mackie 1402 VLZ3 Mixer
description: The Mackie 1402-VLZ3 Premium 14-Channel Compact Mixer builds on the legacy of the extremely popular 1402-VLZ Pro, offering the same great feature set, plus greatly enhanced sound quality, and Tracktion 3 music production software.
features: Phantom power for studio condenser mics
Advanced DC pulse transformer RF rejection
2 Aux sends, level, pan and PFL solo on each channel
2 stereo Aux returns + EFX to Monitor

name: Sony PMW-320K XDCAM EX HD Camcorder
description: The Sony XDCAM EX lineup continues to expand and improve with the PMW-320K Full HD Camcorder.
